data.description:
Create a Jungle, Zoo, and Ocean in your home with Passthrough (augmented reality / mixed reality) and optional handtracking.

Featuring the best of “Jungle Passthrough”, “Ocean Passthrough”, “Animalz Mixed Reality", and more.

October 2024 Update: added new level selection method option, added bonus area with no mixed reality (skybox instead), and added new animals: a humpback whale, 2 new dinosaurs, a new squid and turtle.
August 2024 Update: added custom mixed reality view boundary to many levels (so you can adjust Passthrough radial view distance from spawn origin to keep objects from appearing in walls or too far away) as well as object save state (so you can save your setup between sessions to create a zoo home).

There are over 60 animals, 100 sea creatures, and 70 jungle objects to move, spawn, and delete.

There are over 30 premade areas or you can start from an empty scene. Animals and plants can be spawned randomly, or select animals to copy or enlarge in 3 bonus levels.

Animals include: lions, tigers, bears, dinosaurs, wolves, elephants, rhinos, crocodiles, chickens, sharks, octopus, whales, dolphins, horses, cats, dogs, star fish, leopards, cuttle fish, zebras, owls, seals, lion fish, lizards, goats, sun fish, and many more.

changelog.change_log: Added a new level selection method option, added a bonus area with no mixed reality, added new animals: a whale, squid, turtle, and 2 new dinosaurs.
Fixed bug in table top areas and random mid-sized animal areas.
Major performance update for hand tracking and some minor bug fixes.

August 2024 update: added a save state feature to many levels that allows you to save the position of an object between sessions, this allows you to create a zoo home! Also added a custom mixed reality boundary feature to many levels that allows you to set the view distance of the Passthrough objects (so they don’t appear through your walls). Other performance improvements have also been made.
Added moveable object copy and enlargement rings in the object copy/enlarge levels. This allows much more flexibility to copy and place animals and plants in mixed reality.
